ygData.subject: Re: level 12 necro.. about time!
ygData.msgSnippet: The spells in question can all be cound in Nerriak.  What other spells do you *need*?  Well it all depends on how you want to play your character I suppose.
ygData.messageBody:
The spells in question can all be cound in Nerriak. What other spells do
you *need*? Well it all depends on how you want to play your character I
suppose. Either way, there's spell lists and descriptions on
eq.stratics.com and all spells are in Nerriak.

Good hunting places include Ro, East & West Commons, and once you get a
little higher, Highold pass and beyond are all open to your reign.

With your pet getting stronger and stronger, and the monsters hitting
harder and harder from here on in, you'll be doing less of the tanking,
but you'll figure that out soon enough :)

Zelrek, Necromancer
Rallos Zek


> Ok I just made rank 3 (level 12) Im a dark elf. I am tired of grobb. So I
> have to question. One where is a good place to get ex.. and also here is the
> spells I have. Heat Blood, engulfing darkness, lifedrain, and the new pet
> spell, and affinity bind. what other spells do I need and what taticks do
> you use?
>
> Also where should I go bind my self, to have fun and try new things? I have
> been killing dervish in so ro. and froggies in the swamps of grobb. Thanks
> for your help.
>
